hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: I've just graduated pro lafil erfahrung I think it’s time for more MPs to learn from Richard Fuller’s principled stand. Detention is being used too indiscriminately and without enough thought for the effects on extremely vulnerable women. It is not even effective in achieving its own stated aim of speeding up removals. Absurdly, the Home Office is so chaotic that decisions are taken to detain people who cannot be deported. The research by Medical Justice on the experiences of pregnant women in detention showed that almost all who were detained ended up being released back into the community rather than sent back to their countries – and so their suffering really is unnecessary.
